channel.title: Rmarkdown on Riinu's scripting diary
channel.description: Recent content in Rmarkdown on Riinu's scripting diary

item.title: Converting R Markdown to Latex
item.description: Install Pandoc: http://pandoc.org/ library(knitr) knit('report.Rmd') #This creates 'report.md' Open the Terminal, Command Prompt (search for cmd) or Windows Powershell, go to the folder and do: pandoc -s report.md -o report.tex And that’s it! (Read this, if you want vector images.)
